website_summaries.verdict: Choose this GPS tracker if you don't need a lot of fancy features and don't want to spend a lot of money. Google Maps technology offers a high degree of accuracy.
pros: Works with 4G LTE and Google Maps for precise tracking
Subscription is required, but comes without a contract
Rechargeable, and battery life can last as long as two weeks
cons: Comes with a learning curve, and some owners didn't receive instructions with their units
Has fewer bells and whistles than other choices

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little gadget for a trip I was making and wanted to make sure my luggage was safe and then my personal items I would be leaving behind throughout the day outside amongst strangers. It was perfect and I had zero issues activating it, using it, talking to customer service. I terminated my account for the time being until I go back on Vacation next year. But I would highly highly recommend this little GPS for anything you would want to track. I was going to throw it into my preteens backpack to keep an eye on her as well while she walks home from school, but we decided to get her a phone plan instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melmom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely on point!
customer_reviews.text: This GPS is incredible! Absolutely on point. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for this type of technology. 100% satisfied with this product and will purchase another one when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great, simple to use. My first time trying a GPS Tracker. I would buy this same item again. This tracker, along with the Spy Tec M2 Waterproof Weatherproof Magnetic Case, worked perfect together.
customer_reviews.author: beck mik

customer_reviews.title: Great products and customer service
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using Birdseye for several years. They have the best customer service and tracking products around. This compact tracker works great for short term tracking. We also purchased a weatherproof pelican cover to use it externally on a vehicle. The location accuracy is spot on!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte B

customer_reviews.title: No reasonable,it's will track down everywhere you go.
customer_reviews.text: Unreasonable.This thing will track you down,it doesn't matter where you try to hide.The worst part is,you have to pay $25 US dollars for monthly service
customer_reviews.author: Pham Anh Tuan

customer_reviews.title: Not precise all the time
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it shows exactly where it is other times it may show it is 3 houses away from where it actually is. I do not know why, maybe because it pings from different cell towers? Also, you can not turn on or off the Alarm button yourself they have to do it. The app would be better if I did not have to press update or last to see where it is and auto does not seem to do anything for me but count down.. I have not figured out what I accidentally touch to make it go from map mode to street view and it is not easy to get back to map mode. There is no instruction booklet.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time setting it up, simple and basic but maybe to basic? Peter helped me with Tech support and I can say he actually is very patient and knowledgeable. The mapping app is disappointing too me! I’m thinking about looking for another system. Yes it works, battery life for me is about 12 days! But I have it on basic settings also, and I am not sure if that matters. The accuracy and updates are off sometimes. But I would give it a 3 out 5 stars based on my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Yep. She was cheating
customer_reviews.text: Tracks very well. Only complaint is that there is no actual app to use with the device. They point you towards their website, which is functional, but not optimized for mobile use.
customer_reviews.author: Skibikeplease

customer_reviews.title: Cancelling service is bad
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great slightly off sometimes but beware trying to cancel service is a joke they keep billing you even though you take the correct steps to cancel service . Also if you want to start service again in the future it cost the same as buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Tracker
customer_reviews.text: Great little tracker. Small enough not to be intrusive, but lasts a couple weeks. Reasonably priced for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chc

customer_reviews.title: Very good and fast Tracker
customer_reviews.text: Very good and fast Tracker, 4G should keep it around for quite a while. Unit is fast, support is great and they will help to set up the great peripheral features.
customer_reviews.author: wayne piper

customer_reviews.title: Tech support assistance was outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I needed help setting up my product and the representative was patient with me and walked me through the activating process. Two thumbs up-Kudos to my phone rep. I would definitely recommend this product to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Everything works fine. It came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3, from 3 different brands/stores, and this is the easiest to setup and use. A little more pricey but worth it. I use this to keep track of my car. I keep it in the glove box and the battery will last about a week (in 2 minute interval updates mode). I'm very happy with it. Don't forget, it costs $25 dollars a month for the service.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Needs writen instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This product and customer service aint bad but be prepared to need tech support because it comes for absolutely no writen instructions on how to use it. The plus side is tech support was pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: GPS is accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Very accurate! I was able to catch my cheating husband! So easy to use! Worth every penny!!!!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tracker I ever used, easy to activate and very easy to use. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios B.

product_meta.title: Real Time GPS Tracker with Magnetic Case Combo Pack- Great for Personal and Vehicle Tracking. Nationwide 4GLTE Coverage with Google Mapping, Cancel Anytime. Up to 14 Day Battery Life.
product_meta.description: 4G LTE the latest in GPS Tracking Technology is finally here! Be Certain you will have service no matter where you go! Feel unsafe when you or a friend goes camping or hiking alone? Looking for something to help keep track of important items? Here at Birds Eye Global Tracking, we have just what you need! Our GPS tracker is perfect for those traveling with important luggage that you can’t have lost or even for someone camping or hiking in case of an emergency! The ruggedness of our tracker is great for any rough or harsh terrain! The main feature of our tracker is the real-time location tracking! Using google mapping to track the device,coupled with 4GLTE network you can know exactly where to find it instantly! Our tracker is also equipped with and SOS emergency alarm, in the case that something goes wrong and your tracker needs to be found! We put 100% into satisfying each and every new and loyal customer! So, what are you waiting for? Invest in yourself! Click on the ‘add to cart’ button while supplies last!
feature_bullets: REAL TIME LOCATION -4G LTE is finally here, the latest in GPS Tracking Technology Our GPS tracker is equipped with real time location tracking from your computer, tablet, or smartphone, helping you find your lost or misplaced items! Plans starting at $24.99 a month, No activation or cancellation fees ever, No contracts
WEATHER RESISTANT - The body of our tracker is great for outdoor use as it is weather resistant, making it perfect for camping, hiking, or long trips while away from home!

SOS EMERGENCY - When the button is activated, the SOS function will activate, allowing an alarm signal, helping you locate your device. This is a great product to give to your kids In case of an emergency!
TRUSTED MAPPING - Our GPS tracker also uses Google mapping for the GPS’s tracking and history, helping you feel more comfortable know that we use a trusted company!
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We take great pride and care in manufacturing and developing only the highest quality products for our new and loyal customers! We offer a 30 day money back guarantee!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars34 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: The Raven Real Time Multi Use GPS Tracker
